Verses: 1 naan Karththarai Nambiyirukkiren; Pinnae En Neengal En Aaththumaavai Nokki: Patchiyaippola Un Malaikkup Parandhupo Endru Sollugireergal.
2 idho, Dhunmaarkkar Villai Valaiththu, Semmaiyaana Irudhayaththaarmel Andhagaaraththil Eyyumpadi Thangal Ambugalai Naanile Thodukkiraargal.

4 karththar Thammudaiya Parisuththa Aalayaththil Irukkiraar; Karththarudaiya Singaasanam Paralogaththil Irukkiradhu; Avarudaiya Kangal Manupuththiraraip Paarkkiradhu; Avarudaiya Imaigal Avargalai Sodhiththarigiradhu.
5 karththar Needhimaanai Sothiththarigiraar; Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Kodumaiyil Piriyamullavanaiyum Avarudaiya Ullam Verukkiradhu.
6 dhunmaarkkarmel Kannigalai Varushikkappannuvaar; Akkiniyum Kandhagamum Kadunkodaik Kondhalippum Avargal Kudikkum Paaththiraththin Pangu.
7 karththar Needhiyullavar, Needhiyinmel Piriyappaduvaar; Avarudaiya Mugam Semmaiyaanavanai Nokkiyirukkiradhu.
